NPC.name: elf champion
NPC.description: The elf's athletic though still bootilicious green body is marked with several scars from conflicts. Though her determination, fearless gaze and assorted trophies forming a decorative necklace and belt indicate she didn't get those scars from outright losing too many of those fights. Indeed arkosaur horns, raptor claws, lamia scales and other less identifiable mementos speak to her proficiency with that spear she's holding.
